beta.title: Badge records
beta.description: This modernises the badge record system to make it work better on small devices, and adds a "Completion Plan" view to help identify the quickest way to complete a badge.  This will replace the existing "Badge Completion Wizard" as the functionality is broadly the same.

beta.title: Recipe planner
beta.description: The recipe planner is a community driven database of recipes with simple instructions written for young people.  It appears in the Programme menu.
